content:
I have submitted a PR to the vcpkg repo: https://github.com/microsoft/vcpkg/pull/47866 if anyone would like to review it - I suspect I have been too aggressive with the supported platform(s) but didn't have access to matching build environments...

[wasm-micro-runtime] add new port by GordonSmith 路 Pull Request #47866 路 microsoft/vcpkg
Changes comply with the maintainer guide. The name of the port matches an existing name for this component on https://repology.org/ if possible, and/or is strongly associated with that component o...
